name: Heavy Bike Parking: Real Moto
description:
Heavy Bike Parking: Real Moto is for you to enjoy parking on your motor bike and become addictive to the smooth gameplay of parking on bikes. Enjoy playing this bike parking with great features and stunning environment. It is among top motorcycle and motorbike parking games and will be like a school of bike parking. Use high speed moto bikes for parking at the right place.
features
• Real simulation of furious bike
• Excellent graphics and bike games feature.
• Sim of driving with sports bike
• Stunning sound of engine parking
• Various missions and thrilling task
